body.processed:
Welcome to Decoupled Commerce, where we believe in the power of modern, flexible e-commerce solutions.

Our Mission

We're on a mission to help businesses build beautiful, performant online stores that can scale with their growth. By combining the content management power of Drupal with the commerce capabilities of Shopify, we offer the best of both worlds.

Why Decoupled?

Traditional monolithic e-commerce platforms can be limiting. Our decoupled approach gives you:

  • Flexibility - Choose the best tools for each job
  • Performance - Lightning-fast storefronts with Next.js
  • Scalability - Grow without rebuilding your entire stack
  • Content-First - Rich content experiences powered by Drupal

Our Team

We're a passionate team of developers, designers, and commerce experts dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in e-commerce.

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our products, need help with an order, or just want to say hello, we're here to help.

Get in Touch

Email: hello@example.com

Phone: 1-800-EXAMPLE

Hours: Monday - Friday, 9am - 5pm EST

Visit Our Store

123 Commerce Street
New York, NY 10001
United States

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does shipping take?

Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping options are available at checkout.

What is your return policy?

We offer a 30-day return policy on all items. Items must be unused and in their original packaging.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes! We ship to over 50 countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by location.

How can I track my order?

Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with tracking information.
